typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Gender as string,
		TotalChildren as integer,
		YearlyIncome as integer,
		EnglishEducation as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HighSchoolDataset
HighSchoolDataset aggregate(groupBy(Gender),
	each(match(type=='integer'), concat('Total ', $$) = sum($$))) ~> AggregateGroupbyUsingColumnPattern
AggregateGroupbyUsingColumnPattern sink(input(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['GenderWiseTotalIncomeAndChildrenUsingColumPattern.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> GenderWiseTotalIncomeAndChildrenUsingColumPattern
